summary: Two professional solo climbers form an uneasy partnership after a successful rescue mission grants them the gift of a lifetime.
cast: Jason George|Ned Vaughn|Dabney Coleman|Kyli Santiago|David Stuart|Todd Bridges|Christian Stevens|Christian Jensen|M. Scott Wilkinson|Eddie Matthews|Dawn Bluford|John Shepherd|Mindora Mini Mims|Melinda Haynes|Robert Pierce|Richard Losee|Philip R. Riesen Jr.|Julian Jesse|Andres Orozco|Terry Wood|Jim Schmidt|Isa Alsup|Sina Amedson|Tony L. Calloway|Kannika Coley|Lisa Conley|Clifton Davis|Dan Rudert
title: The Climb
